comments.text: Now that bug 586859 added timestamps to startup cache entries we can make a pretty good guess at which part of the cache will be read on startup. We can madvise/etc all of the files that match the earliest timestamp.
comments.raw_text: Now that bug 586859 added timestamps to startup cache entries we can make a pretty good guess at which part of the cache will be read on startup. We can madvise/etc all of the files that match the earliest timestamp.
